section1.title: Cement board with fiber raw materials
section1.content1: Fibre cement is a mineral composite material that has outstanding aesthetic and physical properties.
section1.content2: Our company has led the development and innovation of this architectural material for over a century under distinct brand names, such as "Eternit".
section1.content3: Currently EQUITONE façade material manufacturing has reached its highest development in Germany and Belgium.

subsections.title: Authenticity
subsections.content: Cement, cellulose and mineral reinforced materials with a visible matrix. Nothing else, EQUITONE is a composite material that proudly displays its true personality.

subsections.title: Performance
subsections.content: EQUITONE can be produced in very large sheets (up to 3m x 1.25m) which are very thin, but have excellent physical properties. EQUITONE is non-combustible (A2 Euroclass). EQUITONE has a service life of more than 50 years in the application of the most desirable exterior materials.

subsections.title: Durability
subsections.content1: Facades built with EQUITONE are thin and light, resulting in minimum degradation of raw material quality.
subsections.content2: EQUITONE's environmental footprint is stated in great detail in the environmental product declaration published on EQUITONE.com.

section2.title: Ventilated facade
section2.content1: Originating from Scandinavia several centuries ago, the technique of ventilated facades (rainscreen) is now very important in areas with harsh climates.
section2.content2: In a rainscreen system, the outer panels deflect rain, and solar heat away from the building. Ventilation spaces allow air to circulate freely behind the panels, so the inside of the building is ventilated and feels comfortable.

subsections.title: Multipurpose
subsections.content: The construction principle of a ventilated facade combines the scalability (coverage) of curtain wall construction with the versatility and creative adaptability offered by traditional building engineering techniques.

subsections.title: Small but maximum
subsections.content: Ventilated facade systems have minimum thickness and weight, but offer maximum views.

subsections.title: Health
subsections.content: The construction principle of a ventilated facade avoids cold bridges, reducing condensation and mold growth.

subsections.title: Shape
subsections.content: EQUITONE facade materials can easily be transformed to many shapes and sizes.

subsections.title: Materials design
subsections.content: Many architects and building designers also use EQUITONE materials in interior and building design

section8.title: Technical data
section8.content1: EQUITONE is committed to the sustainable manufacturing of high-performance facade solutions. Our product range is fabricated with quality management systems (ISO 9001) and environmental systems (ISO 14001).

subsections.title: Skeleton
subsections.content: A lightweight aluminum or galvanized steel frame is attached to a load-bearing structure. The system is easy to install, strong and easily adjustable.

subsections.title: Fixed
subsections.content: EQUITONE façade materials can be attached to the frame using rivets or screws. A solution using invisible fixing is available.
